document.full_text: the man federal authorities have nicknamed the "mullet bandit" robbed another bank in ohio on monday, his fourth heist in the area over the past month.
document.title: "mullet bandit" robs another ohio bank, his fourth in spree
lines_and_colors: the man federal authorities have nicknamed the "mullet bandit" robbed another bank in ohio on monday, his fourth heist in the area over the past month.
